nima 0.6.0

R/nima

The personal R package of Nima Hejazi

Author: Nima Hejazi

What’s nima?

R/nima is a collection of small tools built to help out with statistical and scientific computing for research purposes. While these tools exist as collateral damage from pursuing research, the hope is that this package may be useful to others. For more information, consider consulting the documentation website accompanying the package: https://code.nimahejazi.org/nima.

Installation

Install a recent stable release from CRAN:

install.packages("nima")

Install the stable development version from GitHub via remotes:

remotes::install_github("nhejazi/nima")

Issues

If you encounter any bugs or have any specific feature requests, please file an issue.
